message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is already a competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I am still not able to meet at $12,000. Can we perhaps aim for $11,000?
